Meta_Tags.title: Filo | Luggage Finder
Meta_Tags.keywords: filo-tag, filo, technology, bluetooth-device, device, filo tag, how it works
Meta_Tags.description:
Attach it. Ring it. Find it.
Attach Filo to all your personal objects to find them through a very simple mobile app.

Blocks.title: Luggage trackers help to identify and keep your luggage always with you
Blocks.description:
Drop Filo into your luggage and use the luggage tracker app to ring your luggage and quickly identify and find it. Filo is based on low energy bluetooth technology, made for short distance tracking.

Making your travels less stressful, Filo keeps your things safe where ever you go.
